alert.note: Alert for Polk; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern York and southeastern Polk Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 414 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Shelby to near Stromsburg. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gresham and Waco. This includes Interstate 80 near mile marker 365. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
